biotools.summary: PROMPT is a platform independent system for retrieval, analysis, mapping and comparison of protein sets. It allows easy mapping of different types of sequence identifiers, automatical data retrieval and integration, a multitude of analysis and comparison algorithms and a full-featured easy to use graphical user interface (GUI) application with an integrated help-system.
